response.overview: Malik is a preacher whose sermons never get any views. Desperate to pay rent, he starts faking exorcisms on TikTok to sell Holy Salt as a miracle cure. The scam works perfectly until a wealthy woman offers him 10 million rupiah to cure her son in person. Blinded by the money, Malik accepts the job. Now, he has to fix a real problem using nothing but coarse salt.
response.title: HOLY SALT
